column4: If one has a 64 bit processor, is there any reason to use 32bit ubuntu over 64?  Generally speaking are the same amount of packages and kernel modules available for both 32 and 64 bit?
no massive difference unless there is over 4gb of ram, things like flash are still beta in 64bit nativly
1.5GB RAM.  Is there much performance gain for JUST a desktop user between 32 bit and 64?
